mapper.select: select * from (select a.*,rownum rnum from (select p_no,m_no, p.original_img,p.rename_img,p.img_path,content,p.hashtag,p.gender,p.location,like_count,p.declare_count,p.enroll_date,p.update_date,p.isdelete,m.nickname, m.profile, m.profile_path,(select count(*) from p_reply where r_level=1 and p_no=p.p_no)as replyCount from posting p join member m using(m_no) where p.isdelete = 'N' order by p.like_count desc) a) where rnum between 1 and 4

select * from (select a.*,rownum rnum from (select p.p_no,p.m_no, p.original_img,p.rename_img,p.img_path,content, p.hashtag,p.gender,p.location,like_count,p.declare_count,p.enroll_date, p.update_date,p.isdelete,m.nickname, m.profile, m.rename_img ren, (select count(*) from p_reply r where r.r_level=1 and r.p_no=p.p_no)as replyCount, (select count(*) from p_like l where l.p_no=p.p_no and l.m_no=#{mno}) loginLike, (select count(*) from fan f where me_no = p.m_no and f.you_no=#{mno}) fanCheck from posting p join member m on(p.m_no = m.m_no) where p.isdelete = 'N' order by p.enroll_date desc) a) where rnum between 1 and 9

select * from (select a.*,rownum rnum from (select p.p_no,p.m_no, p.original_img,p.rename_img,p.img_path,content, p.hashtag,p.gender,p.location,like_count,p.declare_count,p.enroll_date, p.update_date,p.isdelete,m.nickname, m.profile, m.profile_path,m.rename_img ren, (select count(*) from p_reply r where r.r_level=1 and r.p_no=p.p_no)as replyCount, (select count(*) from p_like l where l.p_no=p.p_no and l.m_no=#{mno}) loginLike, (select count(*) from fan f where me_no = p.m_no and f.you_no=#{mno}) fanCheck from posting p join member m on(p.m_no = m.m_no) where p.isdelete = 'N' order by p.enroll_date desc) a) where rnum between 10 and 70

select * from (select p.p_no,p.m_no, p.original_img,p.rename_img,p.img_path,content,p.hashtag,p.gender, p.location,like_count,p.declare_count,p.enroll_date,p.update_date,p.isdelete,m.nickname,m.rename_img ren, m.profile, m.profile_path,(select count(*) from p_reply where r_level=1 and p_no=p.p_no) as replyCount, (select count(*) from p_like where p_no=p.p_no and m_no=#{mno}) loginLike, (select count(*) from fan f where me_no = p.m_no and f.you_no=#{mno}) fanCheck, color, name from posting p, style s, category c, member m where p.p_no = s.p_no and s.cate = c.ca_no and m.m_no = p.m_no and (color = #{p.color} and gender = #{p.gender} and name = #{p.category}) order by p.enroll_date) group by p_no, m_no, original_img, rename_img, img_path, content, hashtag, gender, location, like_count, declare_count, enroll_date,update_date,isdelete,nickname,profile,profile_path,replycount,loginLike,fanCheck,ren, color, name order by enroll_date
mapper.insert: insert into notice values (seq_notice.nextval,#{title}, #{content}, sysdate, default)
mapper.update: update notice set content = #{content}, enroll_date = sysdate where n_no = #{nno}
update notice set isdelete = 'Y' where n_no = #{nno}
mapper.select: select * from (select a.*,rownum rnum from (select DISTINCT keyword,(select count(*) from live l2 where l2.keyword=l1.keyword)c ,type from live l1 order by c desc) a) where rnum between 1 and 5
